scripts.start: npm run build && npx http-server app-wiki/output -c-1
scripts.build: npx tiddlywiki static-publishing-wiki --verbose --build index && npm run build-upload-wiki && node ./bin/collect-editions.js && npx tiddlywiki app-wiki --verbose --build index
scripts.dev-upload-wiki: npx nodemon -e tid,multids,js,info --watch upload-files-wiki/plugins ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js upload-files-wiki --listen port=7111
